changelog: ## Added
- Base version with initial version number.
- Device MAC address & ID display.
- OTA update via trigger switches.
- SPIFFS formatting via trigger switches.
- LED driver for indicator functions.
- Changelog feature for firmware update references & scripting.
- OTA progress reporting to ThingsBoard widget for monitoring.
## Changed
- OTA chunk size set to 64 bytes.
## Removed
- Serial debugging output disabled for production build.
## Added
- Lookup table array for structured data access.
## Changed
- "DEBUG_PRINTF" macro now will have "static char msg[64]" for centralised debug buffer.
- Standardised debug output handling, removed local buffer in all functions.
## Removed
- Redundant function prototypes from "main.c".
## Added
- Add New Submersible RD RWG01 Pneumatic Water Gauge Sensor.
- Edit table array lookups for newly add sensor.
- Add a new modbus function and timesequencing for the sensor.
- Add a new ota file url for showcase demonstration.
- Add parity guard code for modbus devices/sensors configuration exchanges instead of calling busSerial.begin
each time.
- Modbus functions now will have specific name for specific functions.
- Seperate function for modbus and compile data.
- Clean and adding new code for modbus file.
- New multitasking code, replacing timeseq function.
